texto: 6.1 Agreement processes This subclause specifies the requirements for the establishment of agreements with organizational entities external and internal to the organization. The Agreement processes consist of the following: a) Acquisition process – used by organizations for acquiring products or services; and b) Supply process – used by organizations for supplying products or services. These processes define the activities necessary to establish an agreement between two organizations. If the Acquisition process is invoked, it provides the means for conducting business with a supplier. This may include products that are supplied for use as an operational software system, services in support
